#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <string.h>


char out[512];

int
main()
{
	int	inp;

	scanf("%d", &inp);

	if (inp == 0) {
		puts ("1");
	} else if (inp == 1) {
		puts("0");
	} else {
		int i = 0, j;
		if (inp & 1) {
			out[i++] = '4';
		}
		for ( j = i; j < inp; j+=2) {
			out[i++] = '8';
		}
		out[i] = '\0';
		puts(out);
	}
	return 0;
}
